title: Pbe website not loading
body: Every time I go to the pbe page to see if I got accepted, it says "Something went Wrong" "Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later." The page has never loaded, and was wondering how to fix it.

replies.body: This is known issue that's currently being investigated where some players can't access the pbe page.  Just in case make sure to you're using the [link ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)specific to your region!  I don't have any updates on the resolution right now, but I'm keeping an eye on it.  Hang tight for now!
I got accepted as well, and when I go to try to make a PBE account it's doing the same thing. Hope you get it fixed.
